text: Excellent work! Your development environment setup looks perfect. I can see you've installed all the essential extensions and configured everything correctly.
Thank you! The setup process was straightforward following your video tutorial.
I see the issue with your Live Server extension. It looks like you need to right-click on your HTML file and select 'Open with Live Server' instead of just clicking the extension icon.
Also, make sure your HTML file is saved in a proper folder structure. The Live Server works best when you have a dedicated project folder.
Thanks for the clarification! I'll try that approach and resubmit.
